column5: Going to Obatanga Provincial Park in the summer for two weeks. Early to post but im excited to go. Last time we went, we did pretty good. Might make a trip to Nagagamisis. Any good fishing to be had there? Am only really looking for some tips or suggestions on where to go as that area has a vast amount of lakes and were only going for 12 days.  Thanks !
assuming not to many people have fished these areas haha pretty far north

Ive passed by obatanga many times heading to the white lake/regan area but never stopped to fish it. I hear both PPs offer good walleye fishing. I'd be interested to hear how you make out.  Best of luck.
we went two years ago. Great pike fishing in some of the lakes around. Numerous fish caught. Nothing huge. Biggest were just over 10lbs.
